segments.text: Excuse me.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Do you have your forms?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Yeah.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Let me see them.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Is there a problem?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Who told you to get in this line?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: You did.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: You were standing at the beginning and you directed me.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Okay. But I didn't tell you to get in this line if you are filling out this particular form.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Well what's the problem?  Let me change it.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: This form is a Z.X.four.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: You can't--  This is not the line for Z.X.four.  If you're going to fill out the Z.X.four, you need to have a different form of ID.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: What?  I'm getting an ID.  This is why I'm here.  My wallet was stolen.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: No. I need another set of ID to prove this is actually you.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: How am I supposed to get an ID without an ID?  How does a person get an ID in the first place?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I don't know.  But I need an ID to pass this form along.  I can't just send it along without an ID.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I'm here to get an ID.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: No.  I need another ID, a separate one.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Like what?  Like a birth certificate?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: A birth certificate, a passport...a student ID; didn't you go to school?  Anything?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Who the hell has a birth certificate?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Yes but my wallet was stolen, I don't have anything.  I don't have any credit cards, I don't have my ID.  Don't you have things on file here?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Yeah.  We keep it on file, but we need an ID to access that file.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: That's out of control.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I don't understand why this is so complicated for people when they get here.  It's just a simple form.  I just need an ID.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: How long have you been working here?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Actually too long.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Clearly.  You know, do you have like a supervisor or something?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Yeah.  Do you want to see my supervisor?  Huh? Yeah.  Do you want to see my supervisor?  Fine.  I'll be right back.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: That would - I would appreciate that.  Yeah.
segments.speaker: F
